Package GameModel

Class cardDealer

java.lang.Object
GameModel.cardDealer
All Implemented Interfaces:
gameConstants, unoConstants
public class cardDealer
extends java.lang.Object
implements gameConstants
The cardDealer class serves dealer of the game. This class is to be used to deal cards from the deck to the players.
